Description: Data on the number of housing units that were empty, rented to tets and tecies in rent arrears for April 2017 to March 2018.
Name: Social Housing Vacancies, Lettings and Arrears
Notes: The stats are produced in Power BI, the dimensions have not been collected as the information will be available in a different format.   The data-set has been divided into 3 subsets:  Vacancies, Lettings and Arrears. There are 4 Meta data and reports within vacancies, 2 meta data and reports within both  lettings and arrears.
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found by scrolling down to the latest release and clicking on the 'Social housing vacancies, lettings and arrears: April 2017 to March 2018' link . Scroll down to data and click on the + this will display 3 option, all options are required and can be accessed by clicking individual links for Vacancies, Lettings and Rent Arrears.  there are numerous link in each link and the Meta data can be  found by linking on the orange symbol and the interactive report by clicking on the text.
Sizing Notes: Available through the odata route, so simple to get, but may need a number of separate downloads / produce a number of different data sets, so needs a fair amount of up-front analysis
